display.title: Acquire: gtceu:cupronickel_ingot
description: Gotta say, Cupronickel ingots look pretty tasty.

&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o IRL, Cupronickel usually contains additional elements such as Iron or Manganese to improve its strength. The Cupronickel in GregTech is probably more like Constantan (55:45 Copper:Nickel).
